t: Amazon
s: My grow room is mostly blue/red/green led lamps, which I love the performance of. Unfortunately Color LED lights usually strain my bare eyes and the grow glasses make it too dark for this rooms needs. There were a lot of contenders, but the price on these Kuarez lights were worth the risk.
